instructions: To go to the Home screen, swipe up then left. To open the Apps list, two-finger swipe up from the bottom of the screen. Navigate to the app that you want to open, then double-tap to open it.
To open your app Overview, swipe left then up. To move between the apps that are open on your device, swipe left or right. To open an app, double-tap.

Open the first app. Navigate to the Overview button, then double-tap. To open the local context menu, swipe up then right. Select Actions . Select Split screen. The top screen shows the first app. The bottom screen lists your recent apps. In the bottom screen, move focus to the second app then double-tap to select. Your screen now shows two apps.
